name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在以使用者為中心的觀點，說明產品與服務之開發與設計相關概念，並以實作方式應用使用者研究的方法，收集、分析與呈現研究資料與成果，使學生具備使用者研究的執行與發表能力。
schedule:
Week 01: No class
Week 02: Introduction
Week 03: Usability test
Week 04: Iterative development and research planning
Week 05: Competitive research
Week 06: No class
Week 07: Team presentation and practice: Interview
Week 08: Team presentation and practice: Focus group
Week 09: Team presentation and practice: Object-based techniques
Week 10: Team presentation and practice: Field observation
Week 11: Team presentation and practice: Dairy study
Week 12: Team presentation and practice: Usability test
Week 13: Team presentation and practice: Survey
Week 14: Cross cultural research
Week 15: Analyzing qualitative data
Week 16: Representing insights as deliverables I
Week 17: Representing insights as deliverables II
Week 18: Reports, presentations and workshops
materials: Observing the User Experience: A Practitioner’s Guide to User Research / by Goodman, Kuniavsky and Moed (2012)
